name: CustomPaint
desc: A widget that provides a canvas on which to draw during the paint phase.

fields.name: painter
fields.desc: The painter that paints before the children.

fields.name: foregroundPainter
fields.desc: The painter that paints after the children.

fields.name: size
fields.desc: The size that this [CustomPaint] should aim for, given the layout constraints, if there is no child.

fields.name: isComplex
fields.desc: Whether the painting is complex enough to benefit from caching.

fields.name: willChange
fields.desc: Whether the raster cache should be told that this painting is likely to change in the next frame.

nodes.name: CustomPaint Bezier Curve
desc: Flutter also supports complex drawings such as Bezier curves.
